TopicTitle: TOLP (Take Off Launchpad Plane) Amphibious Plane

Articles.Content:
This is a, well, read the title. Currently, It is at MKIIII stage, and I need to develop it to make SURE it is safe. Edit #2: Test #1 complete, had a parachute failure, landed using engine. Edit #2: Craft photo!!

NOTE: this is FULLY stock .23.

Also, the flameout alt is 14000.

Here's the download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/a22lbqigvz19ep1/TOLP%20Amphibious%20Plane%20MkIIII.craft%20copy

(IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ) I forgot to set up the gears, so youll have to do that manually Dx

Edited December 18, 2013 by KittyProgram
Added download! :D

If you use Steam I use the steam screen shot ability F12, if you don't I think print screen works.

Also sharing pictures use Imgur, imageshack or something like that.

Last, sharing craft files, dropbox.
Thanks a lot I will be uploading a picture + download soon.
seems overstrutted for an extremely simple design

seems overstrutted for an extremely simple design

Well, the first, MkI, it would rip off without struts from the parachute. And who cares? It gets le job done. c:

By the way... It has about.. 6 struts?
